Package tasks.coref.i2b2

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Constants
    This class contains some type definitions used by SPL pipelines and utilities.
    I2B2AnaphoricityFilter
    A slightly different version of the anaphoricity filter, originally implemented in ExpressionFilterImpl.AnaphoricityFilter.
    I2B2CoreferencePipeline
    The pipeline to resolve coreference in i2b2/VA coreference corpus.
    I2B2CorefWriter
    A writer that contains methods to convert coreference resolution pipeline results to the format that is expected for the i2b2/VA corpus.
    I2B2SectionSegmenter
    This class implements a simple method to segment i2b2 discharge summaries.
    I2B2ToXMLWriter
    The class to read i2b2/VA corpus documents from associated text, markable, and coreference chain files and write them as XML that can be understood by XMLReader class.
    KeyValuePairAgreement
    Implementation of a simple agreement measure that predicts compatibility between key-value pairs, as in Attending: I BUN, M.D., where I BUN, M.D. is the name of the attending physician.
